snippet: Over the holiday season, Premier League soccer is the only sport that will attract more television viewers in Britain than the Professional Darts Corporation’s World Championship.
abstract: Darts, game that was once considered merely a bar pastime, is now a major industry in Europe; tens of thousands of viewers in Britain are expected to tune in to the 2012 Professional Darts Corporation world championship, higher-quality and better-attended of darts’ two world title events.
lead_paragraph: Over the holiday season, Premier League soccer is the only sport that will attract more television viewers in Britain than the Professional Darts Corporation’s World Championship.

headline.seo: Beyond the Bar, Darts Offers Bright Lights and Big Money
headline.main: Beyond the Bar, Darts Offers Bright Lights and Big Money
